ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.summary:
A collection of routines to generatess and analyze laser speckle.  This is a
python port of SimSpeckle Matlab routines described in Duncan & Kirkpatrick,
"Algorithms for simulation of speckle (laser and otherwise)," in SPIE Vol.
6855 (2008).

This implementation contains code for 1D exponential and gaussian speckle,
2D speckle algorithms, and 3D speckle generation.

A collection of routines to generatess and analyze laser speckle.  This is a
python port of SimSpeckle Matlab routines described in Duncan & Kirkpatrick,
"Algorithms for simulation of speckle (laser and otherwise)," in SPIE Vol.
6855 (2008).

This implementation contains code for 1D exponential and gaussian speckle,
2D speckle algorithms, and 3D speckle generation.

name: pyspeckle
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pyspeckle" %}
{% set version = "0.6.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/pyspeckle-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: b5b3077914969ec6c6873906b5172732614b68c027735bfd7f2e0bca7892177c

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools >=44
  run:
    - matplotlib-base
    - numpy
    - scipy
    - python >={{ python_min }}

test:
  imports:
    - pyspeckle
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://github.com/scottprahl/pyspeckle.git
  summary: |
    A collection of routines to generatess and analyze laser speckle.  This is a 
    python port of SimSpeckle Matlab routines described in Duncan & Kirkpatrick, 
    "Algorithms for simulation of speckle (laser and otherwise)," in SPIE Vol. 
    6855 (2008).

    This implementation contains code for 1D exponential and gaussian speckle,
    2D speckle algorithms, and 3D speckle generation.

  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - LICENSE.txt
  doc_url: https://pyspeckle2.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/scottprahl/pyspeckle

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - scottprahl
